page.title: Motorola Processor Options
page.subtitle: How would you like the Motorola processor module to analyze the input file?

checkbox.caption: Immediate operands are unsigned by default
checkbox.help: If this option is off, then a 8bit operand like 0xF0 will be represented as -0x10 a 16bit operand like 0xFF00 will be represented as -0x100 a 32bit operand like 0xFFFF0000 will be represented as -0x10000
